Sentencas: Composites of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and mixed perovskites with the average compositions La0.8Sr0.2Mn(1-x)CoxO3 (x = 0, 0.1, 0.25, and 0.5) and with total loadings of 40 wt % perovskite were prepared by impregnation of aqueous salt solutions into a porous YSZ cathode matrix and examined for their use as cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) at 973 K.
Titulo: An examination of LSM-LSCo mixtures for use in SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: For calcination at 1173 K, the cathode made from La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.75Co0.25O3 showed the best performance of the mixed perovskites, although the improvement over La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) was only modest.
Titulo: An examination of LSM-LSCo mixtures for use in SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: After calcination at 1373 K, LSM - YSZ performed better than any of the mixed perovskites.
Titulo: An examination of LSM-LSCo mixtures for use in SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction showed that Co-containing mixed perovskites undergo a solid-state reaction with YSZ at 1373 K to form insulating phases that decrease the electrochemical performance.
Titulo: An examination of LSM-LSCo mixtures for use in SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: While the addition of 10 wt % CoOx to an LSM - YSZ composite was found to have no effect on cathode performance, the addition of 10 wt % La0.8Sr0.2CoO3 to an LSM - YSZ composite dramatically decreased the cathode area-specific resistance from 0.45 Omega cm(2) to approximately 0.1 Omega cm(2).
Titulo: An examination of LSM-LSCo mixtures for use in SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: Based on these results, the possibilities for improving the performance of LSM-based cathodes through doping with Co-containing compounds are discussed.
Titulo: An examination of LSM-LSCo mixtures for use in SOFC cathodes
An examination of LSM-LSCo mixtures for use in SOFC cathodes
